TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit VisualStyleElement/Button/CheckBox extends System.Object
public: ref class VisualStyleElement::Button::CheckBox abstract sealed

summary.span: Provides objects for the different states of the check box control.

span.span: Provides objects for the different states of the check box control.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每一個屬性的類別會傳回不同狀態的核取方塊控制項。Each property of the class returns a for a different state of the check box control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立與傳回屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to create a with the returned by the property. 若要執行這個範例，請將其貼入 Windows Form 中。To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form. 處理表單的事件和呼叫`DrawVisualStyleElement_Button_CheckBox1`方法從事件處理方法，傳遞`e`為。Handle the form’s event and call the `DrawVisualStyleElement_Button_CheckBox1` method from the event-handling method, passing `e` as . [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#14](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples/CS/Form1.cs#14)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#14](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples/VB/Form1.vb#14)]
